ygData.subject: RE: Castle Mistmoore (was: Trade of the Century..)
ygData.msgSnippet: Can anyone tell me how to get OUT ... When you come up the ramp from the room that you dropped into from the crypt, go left.  Its a secret door that looks like
ygData.messageBody:
Can anyone tell me how to get OUT
>of that area? The only door that I saw that opens,
>opens up 3 other doors with creatures that don't
>exactly like visitors stopping by for brunch.

When you come up the ramp from the room that you dropped into from the
crypt, go left. Its a secret door that looks like a wall.(Just walk
through) This will lead you into a tiny room that appears to have no doors.
Turn left again and go through the secret door that also looks like a
wall. You are now behind the crypt in the gy.

-Treehugger and Songmaker
